Property.name: baseCls
Property.comment: The base CSS class applied to the fieldset (defaults to 'x-fieldset').

Property.name: checkboxName
Property.comment: The name to assign to the fieldset's checkbox if {@link #checkboxToggle} = true (defaults to '[checkbox id]-checkbox').

Property.name: checkboxToggle
Property.comment: True to render a checkbox into the fieldset frame just in front of the legend, or a DomHelper config object to create the checkbox. (defaults to false). The fieldset will be expanded or collapsed when the checkbox is toggled.

Property.name: itemCls
Property.comment: A css class to apply to the x-form-item of fields. This property cascades to child containers.

Property.name: labelWidth
Property.comment: The width of labels. This property cascades to child containers.
